Title: Relates to comprehensive diversity in procurement and employment act of 2021
Summary: Enacts the comprehensive diversity in procurement and employment act to encourage full and equal participation in public sector business opportunities across the state.
LawCode: Amd §§162 & 179-f, St Fin L; amd §4-a, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law and the executive law, in relation to the comprehensive diversity in procurement and employment act of 2019
